data.title: Final Grihalakshmi Press Kit
data.meta_description: Final Grihalakshmi Press Kit - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This press kit introduces the film "Grihalakshmi - The Awakening" which tells the story of two sisters where the younger sister who meditates wins over the future mother-in-law. The film aims to introduce Sahaja Yoga meditation, which originated in India in 1970 and has millions of practitioners worldwide. The film hopes to spread awareness of this meditation technique and show how it can help transform people's lives and create peace in society. The producers are seeking global release and promotion of the film to spread knowledge of India's ancient spiritual traditions.
